EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Stuck in Traffic? Saved by Big Data!_Q214.Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us last week: Stuck in Traffic? Saved by Big Data!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining us last week for our webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/stuck-in-traffic-saved-by-big-data> "Stuck in Traffic? Saved by Big Data!". We hope you found the session informative.
We reviewed how Pivotal's Data Science Team has developed several methods to analyze traffic information from real-time data sources. Using a variety of methods on a massively parallel analytics database system, the team demonstrated a traffic disruption model that can predict the duration of recent incidents â€“ learning the disruption patterns of a major city.
View the replay now <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/stuck-in-traffic-saved-by-big-data>.
We look forward to you joining us next time.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
